description: First flight (BA284) delayed 90 minutes due to air traffic control. Customer arrived at BKK but missed TG401 connection to Sydney. Currently in Bangkok airport.
customer_message: I just missed my connecting flight to Sydney because BA was delayed. I'm stuck in Bangkok airport and my flight left 20 minutes ago. I have the guarantee - can you help me?
expected_resolution: Rebook on next available BKK-SYD flight within 12 hours. Provide hotel if overnight wait. Full guarantee coverage applies.

description: Lufthansa flight delayed 3 hours due to technical issue. Customer wants to know rights and options.
customer_message: My flight LH400 from Frankfurt to New York is delayed by 3 hours. The airline says it's a technical problem. Am I entitled to any compensation? I need to get to an important meeting.
expected_resolution: Inform customer of EU261 rights: €600 compensation from airline. No Pineapple guarantee but can assist with claim. Offer rebooking if customer prefers alternative flight.

description: Emirates cancelled EK7 due to operational reasons. Customer will miss BA308 connection to JFK. Platinum tier customer, high value.
customer_message: Emirates just cancelled my Dubai to London flight (EK7). This means I'll miss my connection to New York and I have critical meetings tomorrow. I'm a platinum member and this is unacceptable. What are you going to do about this?
expected_resolution: Priority rebooking on next available DXB-LHR-JFK routing. Consider direct DXB-JFK if available. VIP handling with manager approval. Compensation voucher. Update customer within 30 minutes.

description: Customer asking about guarantee coverage for future trip. No current issue.
customer_message: Hi, I have a booking from Madrid to Lisbon to São Paulo in February. I bought the guarantee but I'm not totally clear what it covers. If my first flight is delayed and I miss the connection, what happens?
expected_resolution: Explain guarantee coverage clearly. Reference specific terms. Reassure customer they're covered for airline-caused delays. Provide contact info for when they're traveling.

description: System detected SK1425 has 45-minute delay. Customer currently on flight. Will likely miss DY7014 connection at Copenhagen.
expected_resolution: Proactive outreach. Inform customer of delay and tight connection. Have backup rebooking options ready. Monitor flight and be prepared to execute if connection missed. Handle sensitively given previous issues.

scenario: Missed connection - customer fault, no guarantee
description: Customer arrived late to gate for AA150 due to traffic. Missed flight. Has no guarantee. Asking for help.
customer_message: I got stuck in traffic and missed my flight from LA to New York. I know it's my fault but is there anything you can do? I really need to get to Boston today.
expected_resolution: Limited options. Not covered (customer fault + no guarantee). Can assist with rebooking but customer pays change fees + fare difference. Be empathetic but clear about policy limits. Check for goodwill options if low cost.

description: Thai Airways moved TG401 departure time 3 hours earlier. Customer notified 2 weeks before travel. Connection now impossible.
customer_message: I just got an email that my Bangkok to Sydney flight time changed and now departs 3 hours earlier! My connection from London gets in way too late now. Can you fix this?
expected_resolution: Covered by guarantee (major schedule change). Rebook on alternative BKK-SYD flight that works with BA284 arrival. No cost to customer. Confirm new itinerary ASAP.

description: Customer was rebooked after EK7 cancellation but wants refund instead. Premium guarantee holder.
customer_message: Thank you for rebooking me, but actually I've decided I don't want to travel anymore after this mess. Can I just get a full refund instead?
expected_resolution: Full refund available (airline cancelled, guarantee holder, VIP). Process within 24-48 hours. Offer compensation voucher for inconvenience. Manager approval for goodwill gesture given tier + disruption.
